content.question: In the way it combines human and animal features, the Buk (mask) from the Torres Strait is most similar to the

choices.label: Olmec-style mask from the Templo Mayor
Bundu mask of the Mende peoples
Female (Pwo) mask of the Chokwe peoples

topic.text: 9.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
